datatypeProperties.comment: Systems in place to ensure adherence to international conventions on biodiversity and best practices (CITES, CBD, CMS, CCD, among others).Is the standard consistent with relevant international conventions on biodiversity, ecosystems and conservation?

Procedures in place that control or prohibit using fire or explosives in production and / or for clearing land areas.Does the standard include criteria on the application of fire or explosives for the clearing of land (e.g. slash & burn)?
Does the standard require processes in place to avoid crop disease cross -contamination?
Procedures in place for the cultivation of mixed genotypes of each main crop.Does the standard include requirements to cultivate a mix of genotypes of each main crop?

Systems in place to identify, restore and rehabilitate natural habitats and/or ecosystems.Does the standard include biodiversity requirements specific to the restoration or rehabilitation of natural habitats and/or ecosystems?

Systems in place for identifying and managing environmental and social values based on the commonly used six HCV categories.Does the standard use the HCV terminology as intended by the HCV Resource Network?

Infrastructure in place to properly access agricultural inputs and services, as well as national and local markets, to reduce food losses.Does the standard include criteria related to infrastructure, storage buildings and proximity to human settlements?
Does the standard include requirements to identify risks and regularly monitor production activity impacts on ecosystem function?

Procedures in place to assess potential impacts on biodiversity values prior to any significant intensification or expansion of cultivation or infrastructure. Does the standard require an impact assessment policy in place to assess potential impacts of new production (production land, processes, new cropsâ€¦)?

Systems in place to mitigate negative environmental impacts prior to production and harvesting operations.Does the standard include criteria on mitigating negative environmental impacts prior to production/operation?

Procedures in place to maintain legally and internationally recognized protected areas for the achievement of long term conservation of nature.Does the standard have requirements to respect legally protected and internationally recognized protected areas?
Does the standard include criteria on maintaining or protecting rare, threatened or endangered ecosystems?
Procedures in place for priority in use of native species over foreign species.Does the standard include criteria on the priority of native species?
Processes in place for minimal impacts on wildlife populations.Does the standard include criteria for minimized impacts on wildlife populations (e.g. UEBT)?
Does the standard include criteria on fish density and diversity?
Procedures in place to address land-use planning and identification of conservation priorities.Does the standard include criteria for the monitoring and protection of High Conservation Value Areas?
Does the standard require the identification, monitoring and maintenance of natural wetlands and/or watercourses impacted by production?
Other criteria related to biodiversity not covered above.Does the standard include additional criteria related to biodiversity not covered above?
Does the standard include an overarching policy or set of principles on biodiversity?
Does the standard explicitly require implementation of post-production / post-harvesting practices that aim to protect and preserve biodiversity?
Does the standard include criteria relating to open pit/underground extractive practices (e.g. mining sector)?

Procedures in place for the use of independent expertise in assessing HCVs prior to expansion of cultivation or plantation.Does the standard require independent expertise to be used as a resource in determining HCVs prior to expansion of operations?

Prohibition of production on land with High Conservation Value (HCV) with conversion cut-off date no later than 2009 or at least five years history.Does the standard prohibit production on land with High Conservation Value (HCV)?
Does the standard include requirements for the protection of rare and threatened species and their habitats within the unit of operations?
Systems in place for the provision of regulated and suitable housing for wildlife living specimens.Does the standard require regulated and suitable housing of wildlife living specimens?

Procedures in place to regulate access to resources and use of wildlife species.Does the standard include criteria on illegal activities such as hunting, fishing, trapping, collection of NTFP's (non-timber forest products) etc.?
Does the standard include requirements for net positive gain in biodiversity?
Does the standard require processes in place to ensure that production activities avoid net loss in biodiversity?
Processes in place for the creation and or conservation of ecological niches.Does the standard include criteria on safeguards against fragmentation of good quality ecosystems/habitats?
Procedures in place for the integration of buffer zones.Does the standard include criteria on ecosystem protection through spatial management (conservation areas, 'set aside' or buffer zones)?
Processes in place for the protection of rare, threatened or endangered species within the unit of operations.Does the standard include criteria on rare, threatened or endangered species?
Does the standard require sustainable timber harvesting to conserve the forest stand?

Processes in place to ensure that products are not harvested at levels above sustainable yields.Does the standard explicitly require that products are harvested at levels that ensure sustainable management and use of natural resources?
Processes in place for the management or prohibition of introduction of alien invasive species.Does the standard include criteria on the use of alien invasive species?
Does the standard include requirements on biotechnologies (e.g. their use and management in production processes)?
Does the standard include requirements on bycatch management and reduction of discards?
Does the standard prohibit the use of destructive fishing methods such as dynamite and poison?
Does the standard promote the sustainable exploitation of marine resources including restoration of overfished and depleted stocks?
Does the standard include a general principle on wildlife?
